DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study investigate predictive value corneal biomechanical property corneal reshape therapy role parameter determine amount myopia reduction .
DOC.detailed_description: Experiment 1 : To evaluate change corneal biomechanics cause short-term corneal reshape therapy . Subjects wear conventional RGP lens one eye , randomly select , orthokeratology lens fellow eye , 30 minute , 60 minute one night , respectively . Corneal stiffness tangent modulus measure wearing period . Experiment 2 : To evaluate change recovery corneal biomechanics effect long-term corneal reshape assess whether corneal biomechanics predict rate corneal reshape . Subjects wear orthokeratology lenses 6 month . Regular follow visit ( 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month ) arrange monitor change corneal stiffness tangent modulus .
DOC.criteria: Myopia 4D 5D , withtherule astigmatism 1.5D , spherical equivalent 4D 5.75D , difference two eye within 1D , best correct spectacle visual acuity 0.10 logMAR eye previous corneal reshape therapy , longterm contact lens wear , ocular disease
